column4: can anyone tell me how to monitor if someone else is using my wifi network?
mrcollins i cant do that because my router is incompatible with linux
tampj: show all the packets that your network adapter can "see"
i.e all the packets heading to your wireless router from connected clients
you can look for rogue clients and even see what web pages they are visiting, it any
np, btw the gui version is called something else
oh whats the name of it
dsl man can i add u on messenger?
by the way msn will also work
